citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Rodent feces was found in several areas of the dog kennel. There were numerous mouse droppings observed on the
floor of the storage areas and on the shelves holding the grooming supplies and facility records. The facility has been
setting traps in the kennel, but their current program does not appear to be effective in controlling mammalian pests in
these areas.
Failure to maintain an effective program to control mammalian pests can have a negative impact on the the health of the
animals through the spread of disease by contamination of animal areas and feed.
The licensee must correct by implementing an effective pest control program in all animal areas.
Correct by: 08/9/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.11(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Rodent feces was found in several areas of the dog kennel. There were numerous mouse droppings observed on the 
floor of the storage areas and on the shelves holding the grooming supplies and facility records. The facility has been 
setting traps in the kennel, but their current program does not appear to be effective in controlling mammalian pests in 
these areas.  
Failure to maintain an effective program to control mammalian pests can have a negative impact on the the health of the 
animals through the spread of disease by contamination of animal areas and feed. 
The licensee must correct by implementing an effective pest control program in all animal areas. 
Correct by: 08/9/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
